title: how long does it take to get help for account recovery and other questions
body:
i have been waiting for about 24 hours a riot employee emailed me i emailed him back and never gave me a response never even gave me any alignment.
i know it could be also  just me being impatient but i lost my account to a random hacker and they reset everything i could rest easier if i knew i would get everything back all my skins and stats. gg.op has all my old stats and i idk if it is because he switched my region or if he just took everything somehow. i was also thanking if i just payed to get my account transferred the server would have my info and just link back to my account. {{item:3151}}

replies.body:
We're pretty overloaded with tickets at the moment, but we're not going to leave you behind. Please remain patient and an account specialist will get to your ticket as soon as possible.

Let me know if you have any questions.

I have the same problem, except I had my debit card saved on my account, and the person bought $200 worth of RP, I have tried to recovery my account, but even when I reset the password, it tells me "Sorry, we couldn't find that combination of username, password, and region". So I am unsure of how to continue, I submitted a ticket almost a week ago, and have gotten no response. If you get your issue handled please don't forget me ^_^. If anyone from RIOT sees this message can anyone please give me any insight into this problem? Also, I was able to be logged into my old account using LOLfriends APP and talk to my friends until the day before all this happened, then when I tried to reset my password, thats when everything went downhill FAST!

Thanks.
